appleAirpodsPro2.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd gen
appleAirpodsPro2.description: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) with MagSafe Case (USB-C) provide excellent sound, active noise cancellation, and a comfortable fit.
